dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5253 IH: Office of Government Information Services Empowerment Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Farenthold (for himself and Mr. Cartwright) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend section 552(h) of title 5, United States Code, to require agencies provide records to the Director of the Office of Government Information Services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Office of Government Information Services Empowerment Act of 2018.
Section 552(h) of title 5, United States Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Each agency shall make any record available to the Director of the Office of Government Information Services for purposes of carrying out this subsection, upon request of the Director.
